src:
Lampardov Čelsi u gostima se oseća kao kod kuće, Votford još bez pobede
02 Nov 2019, 20:32 by Darko
Votford – Čelsi 1:2(0:1)Delofeu 79′(p) – Abraham 5′, Pulišić 55′
Fudbaleri Čelsija pobedili su peti put na gostovanjima u aktulnoj sezoni Premijer lige.
Tim Frenka Lamparda slavio je u Votfordu, protiv poslednjeplasirane istoimene ekipe, sa 2:1 i “smestio“ se na treće mesto iza Sitija i Liverpula. Već u 5. minutu Tami Abraham je doveo “plavce“ u vođstvo. On je lobovao Fostera posle odličnog dodavanja Žoržinja, i stigao do svog 9. premijerligaškog gola u sezoni.
Prednost gostiju je duplirana 50 minuta kasnije, ponovo je to bila lepa akcija Čelsija, Abraham je pronašao Pulišića, a američkog reprezentativcu nije bilo teško da loptu pošalje u mrežu. Nadu “stršljenovima“ da mogu bar do boda na svom Vikerejdž Roudu doneo je Delofeu sa bele tačke u 79. minutu. Najbolju priliku imali su u poslednjoj sekundi, kada je golman Foster tukao glavom psle ubačene lopte iz prekida, ali je Kepa Arizabalaga sjajno odbranio.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
"Soul Cha" sick red devil, closing the account is not sharp

02 Nov 2019, 20:39


"Ole Gunnar Solcha" the Red Devils coach complained to the team, closing the account is not sharp after attacking by "Bournemouth" slashed 1-0.

Ole Gunnar Solcha, the manager of Manchester United, admits "Red Devils" still lack quality in finishing The Raiders narrowly lost 0-1 in the English Premier League game at the Vitality Stadium on Saturday. This game Manchester United started well. And had more chances to win a goal than Bournemouth in the first 15-20 minutes but could not break the door before the "The Cherries" could set the game and become the winning goal from Joshua's footsteps. Former Red Devils' former King in injury time in the first half. "Many times we still lack the quality of the goal. I think we started well. And stretched them out by playing on the edge of James's line, but we couldn't score the first goal that was very important. After 15 or 20 minutes, Bournemouth came back into the game. Get "". It turned out to be a 50/50 game and you know that Whoever gets the first goal will definitely win. From then on they get the magic of Josh (Joshua King). Playing here is always difficult. And not a game with goalscoring goals because both teams have good defensive games, "Solcha said.
